text:
As webdav becomes more common this will frustrate more 
people.  In fact, jakarta's "SLIDE" project demonstrates
the defect, anyone who installs and works with SLIDE
will see this defect via thrown exceptions.

Here's the problem:

Webdav has added one new HTTP response status
code:
   207 Multi-Status

The solution is easy:
Please add this line to tomcat/core/LocalStrings.properties:

sc.207=Multi-Status
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
